forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers developing for the afternoon. High 16C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Thundershowers this afternoon following a period of morning rain and wind. High around 60F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers likely. Low 7C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers likely. Low around 45F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 58F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Windy. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early with showers developing late. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early with showers developing late. Low 47F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 16C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High around 60F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 61F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
